description:
If you crave a pulse-pounding and exhilarating experience, you've found your ultimate destination. In “GhostX”, you step into the shoes of an elite sniper, entrusted with the critical mission of eliminating targets.
     Key Advantages:
   ▪ Diverse Environments: Engage in thrilling missions across urban streets and tranquil forests, each demanding distinct tactics.
   ▪ Challenging Missions: Take your sniping skills to the next level by mastering the art of shooting from a helicopter, eliminating targets on a moving train, and more. 
   ▪ Customise Your Arsenal: Personalise your weapons with various scopes, including night and thermal vision, for superior long-range precision.
   ▪ Weapon Mastery: Fine-tune barrels, mufflers, and magazines, and choose eye-catching skins. Unlock upgrades for enhanced power and control.
   ▪ Immersive Experience: Enjoy stunning visuals and lifelike audio for an immersive adventure. 
     Dive into the ultimate sniper simulator and prove your prowess. “GhostX” awaits – are you up to the challenge?
name: The GhostX : Sniper Simulator (Tactical Shooting & Eliminator)
